773300.name: Fantasy Grounds - Hunter's Mark (5E)
773300.description:
HUNTERS MARK 5e Adventure Book: Hunt for Monstrous Dinosaurs

"Beneath the waves of the Conquering Sea, a primordial island rises and with it a new threat from an old enemy. Known as Primalrites, this monstrous race of dinosaurs were long forgotten by the monster hunters of today, but ancient fossils remain. And now, the island shudders once more as they return, seeking revenge against those that drove them to an early extinction.
You are about to embark on a rousing adventure that pits mighty hunters against monstrous dinosaurs on an island not big enough for both. These wildly fantastical hunts are recreated whenever you play the Hunters Mark adventure."
120+ Full-Color Pages covering:
  • 28 Awesome Boss Monsters
  • 30 Epic Weapons & Armors
  • 10 Pre-generated Hunters
Plus, Rules for Crafting Gear with Spoils, Creating Custom Pets, and new Downtime Activities!
Conversion by:Rob Twohy
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Team Twohy LLC
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
